meanings.definition: A low stool or support for the feet.
meanings.sent1: I like to rest my feet on the footstools while watching TV.
meanings.sent2: The living room set included two matching footstools.
meanings.sent3: The footstools at the library were so tiny, they made me feel like a giant.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness acted as a footstool, supporting me through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The footstools in the waiting room were as soft as clouds.

meanings.definition: A piece of furniture consisting of a low stool or support for the feet.
meanings.sent1: The antique footstools in the parlor added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: She placed a tray of snacks on the footstools for the guests.
meanings.sent3: The footstools in the classroom were used as impromptu desks by the students.
meanings.sent4: His words served as a footstool, lifting her spirits when she was down.
meanings.sent5: The footstools in the garden were painted in vibrant colors.
